01. Lost In Forever
 

 Beyond The Black recorded their first album. Beyond The Black Features Female Fronted Metal, from the intricate gothic melodies to energetic guitar solos. The Group is not afraid to use melancholic keyboard passages, not just  metal, for example, the song "In The Shadows".  This combination of powerful choirs and flutes, bagpipes plus for atmospheric sounding. 
And always in the spotlight voice 19-year-old Jennifer. Together with friends and using all of its wide range of musical tastes from Evanescence to Pantera, it has created a group in Mannheim. 
Jennifer herself playing with six years on the piano, and seven - saxophone. The first performances of Jennifer musical groups began when she was only nine years old. Some people are born for music. 
Later, she was "discovered" for himself the guitar and won her several music competitions at the same time revealing a desire for more and more rock and metal music as a means of self-expression.

Thus the creation of Beyond The Black, and their debut album, which was produced in collaboration with Sascha Paeth (Avantasia)
